item.title: Minister lays foundation stone for Kidwai cancer unit in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister for Medical Education and Raichur district in-charge Sharan Prakash Patil has said that the State government is planning to establish cancer and superspeciality hospitals in each district with a vision to extending universal health coverage to citizens.
He was addressing a gathering after laying the foundation stone for constructing the Kidwai Peripheral Cancer Unit on the grounds of Rajiv Gandhi Super Speciality Hospital, which comes under the Raichur Institute of Medical Sciences (RI...]]>
